column5: This spot is only minutes away from Six Flags San Antonio has a gated entrance and is quite and beautiful. You will be minutes from The Rim shopping center, The Palladium theaters and The Bass Pro Shop store. Drive West a little ways and shop at the little Town of Boerne. Enjoy this great RV with microwave a large shower, queen bed in the master bedroom night lights plenty of plugs, cold a/c large Tvs local channels and digital channels plus blue ray and surround sound system.
column8: Beautiful RV close to Six Flags San Antonio
